definitions.definition: a person who suffers very much or is killed because of their religious or political beliefs, and is often admired because of it:
someone who tries to get sympathy from others when he or she has a problem or too much work, usually when that person caused the problem or chose to do the work himself or herself:
examples: She offers to do extra work, then plays the martyr!

definitions.definition: to kill someone because of their religious or political beliefs
